items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-4 weeks depending on order complexity and volume. Rush orders are available upon request.

items.answer: We follow strict ISO 9001 quality standards with comprehensive testing and precision manufacturing processes for every component.

aboutusintro.title: About Ganesh Steel
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering in Door Hardware Manufacturing
aboutusintro.description: Founded 25 years ago, Ganesh Steel specializes in manufacturing high-quality steel door hinges and stoppers. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern engineering to deliver exceptional metal components for diverse industrial applications.

items.name: Rajesh Sharma
items.content: Ganesh Steel's door hardware has consistently met our high-quality standards. Their attention to detail and reliable delivery make them our preferred supplier.

items.name: Priya Patel
items.content: We've been working with Ganesh Steel for over a decade. Their custom door hardware solutions are innovative, precise, and always exceed our expectations.
